title: Summarization and Feedback Strategies to Improve Scientific Writing Skills for L2 Learners

context.prior_knowledge: Fundamental Academic Writing Structure and Understanding of Basic Scientific Terminology
context.additional_context: A science-focused academic writing enhancement program conducted in a limited technological environment centered on smartphones.

learning_goals: Learners will be able to summarize key ideas from scientific texts with 80% accuracy.
Learners will be able to revise their summaries by at least 60% after reflecting on written feedback from instructors three or more times.
Learners will be able to perform academic writing that avoids plagiarism by altering the linguistic structure of source texts by 70%.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
